reviews.review: What happens when you have a lot of money but zero creativity? This hot mess of a movie. This  movie is a cash grab and didn't even deserve the rating of 8. Not to mention the fact it should be sued for obvious trademark problems. I was literally cringing through the whole thing
Ummmm...well, it looked like it was trying to combine Wreck-It Ralph with Inside Out and a dash of Wizard of Oz, but it ended up having none of the zazzle of any of those films.
It gave me stage 4 terminal cancer
Actually one of the best movies i've seen in a long time. Surprisingly entertaining and had my attention the whole time. 5 stars for sure
It's sad that RT doesn't have a 1/4  star rating.
One of the worst movies of all time. It's pretty much an 86 minute ad. I didn't smile once, let alone laugh, through this whole excuse for a film. I grew more cynical and dead inside after watching.

Should be called the longest running advertisement for Candy Crush Movie. It is just one bad pun after another and is soulless. Just a sad excuse of a movie in an attempt to just dumb down all of our kids. Anyone child or adult that watches this movie will be dumber for it.

I hate this film with a crimson rage.
this shoddy "film" somehow manages to insult the entire entertainment industry and the  human race in one go simply by existing.

it really wasn't that bad i personally think people didn't see that there were some really good lessons about being a good person for example, not caring only about yourself, and being yourself regardless of what other judge mental people say, and to express who you are. and to learn to except someone for who they are instead of looking at them like they are a freak. ya sure it isn't the best movie in the world but it wasn't the worst thing i,ve seen i actually thought it was pretty entertaining. then again  i tend to like underrated things.

Oh my god, this movie is soul drainingly bad. My mom convinced me to watch it with her ironically. It's kind of funny how the movie is about emojis, derived from the word emotions, because I felt nothing after witnessing this train wreck. I swear I went to school the next day and just didn't talk the whole day because this movie drained every last bit of happiness from my soul. On the plus side, (spoilers) hi-5 dies at one point and that was nice but then he just came back. Do not watch if you like to be happy.
